author: Wayne Collins
description: A Daiquiri laced with generous fruit and a touch of vanilla.
name: Bajan Passion
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
